title: Beautiful and Spacious top floor condo w/ balcony & covered parking
map_address: 200 N Jefferson Street, Unit 2403 near Lake Street
posting_body: Spacious 1 bed/1 bath, top floor unit in hot Fulton River District is available beginning September 1st.
Rent includes one parking space in attached heated garage.
Unit features include hardwood floors, maple cabinets, Stainless appliances, granite countertops, gas fireplace with marble surround, walk-in master closet, balcony, and washer/dryer in unit.
Building amenities include exercise room, extra storage, doorman, sun deck and bike room.
Starbucks and dry cleaner on ground floor.
Balcony faces west for gorgeous sunset views.
Building is in an ideal location sandwiched between River North and the West Loop.

Located just two blocks from expressway, one block to The El (pink/green line stop), 10 minute walk to the loop, and minutes from parks, grocery, Randolph Street/Fulton Market restaurants, The French Market, Chicago River Walk and more.
